biotools.summary: Given a dated species tree S, a set of gene trees G, and a set of costs for gene events (duplications, transfers and losses), the program computes the score of a most parsimonious reconciliation (MPR).

bioschemas.name: TERA
bioschemas.summary: Given a dated species tree S, a set of gene trees G, and a set of costs for gene events (duplications, transfers and losses), the program computes the score of a most parsimonious reconciliation (MPR).
